name: Warnicorn
description:
For a long time war has raged...

Its end brought upon the galaxy the dawn of the best sport ever seen...

Four unicorns, riding their astronauts, face each other for the title of greatest knight...

In a match of...

Space joust!

NOTE: Don't forget to configure the controls before launching the game!

Prototype made for CampJam 2016.

A Game by Gamux.
